question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: Sebutkan tempat wisata penting di Teruel, Spanyol.
answer: Tempat wisata penting di Teruel, Spanyol antara lain adalah Menara Mudéjar Teruel, Katedral Santa María de Mediavilla, dan Plaza del Torico.
answer_translated_eng: Notable sights in Teruel, Spain include Teruel Mudéjar Tower, Santa María de Mediavilla Cathedral, and Plaza del Torico.
